attributes.action: introduce a new telephone protocol law to prevent lost time when attempting to reconnect a dropped call.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The law should state that: "Following the instance of a dropped call, only the party who instigated the call should attempt to redial."

This would reduce the amount of time spent trying to reconnect the 2 parties and would ultimately help businesses and individuals be more efficient and thus aid the recovery of the British economy.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
